metadata.affected_nodes: 50 major nodes including PostgresV2, HttpRequest, GoogleSheetsV1, MicrosoftTeamsV2

description.problem: Nodes with versioned subdirectories (v1/, v2/, V1/, V2/, V3/) extract 0 properties because extractor reads main node file but doesn't follow versionDescription imports
description.impact: HIGH - 50 major nodes completely missing all property data, operations, and complete functionality documentation
description.root_cause: PostgresV2.node.ts imports versionDescription from './actions/versionDescription' which contains the actual properties array. Extractor only reads PostgresV2.node.ts and sees empty constructor, missing the imported description.
evidence: Actual source (actions/versionDescription.ts) has full properties array with 100+ properties
HttpRequest.node.ts is a VersionedNodeType wrapper - properties in V1/V2/V3 subdirs
Validation report shows 50 nodes with zero properties extracted

2025-11-07 manual spot-check: extracted_docs/PostgresV2_data.json remains empty while n8n/packages/nodes-base/nodes/Postgres/v2/actions/versionDescription.ts lists icon, inputs, outputs, credentials, and populated properties array

2025-11-07 manual spot-check: extracted_docs/httpRequest_data.json has empty properties/credentials despite n8n/packages/nodes-base/nodes/HttpRequest/HttpRequest.node.ts wiring to populated V1/V3 descriptions
2025-11-07 manual spot-check: extracted_docs/NotionV2_data.json has zero properties while n8n/packages/nodes-base/nodes/Notion/v2/VersionDescription.ts defines full metadata
description.fix_approach:
1. Detect versionDescription import pattern in main node file
2. Follow import to actual description file (e.g., ./actions/versionDescription.ts)
3. Extract properties from versionDescription export instead of main node file
4. Handle ...database.description spread operators in properties array
5. For VersionedNodeType, extract from version-specific files (V1/, V2/, V3/)
